title: LF Top & Mid laner for ranked 5s gold+
body:
Hi guys i will be putting together a ranked 5s team or 2, depending how often players play. getting interest seems as tho its hard to find players nowadays. i will be in bali for a couple weeks from monday so add me in game and if im not online before i head out ill put a team together when im back from bali

No 5s exp necessary just gotta be able to win ur lane consistently in solo que, u must be willing to listen rather than do your own thing. if you like to do your own thing all the time please dont apply just stick to solo q

i will be accepting all requests in game as its always good to have players that want to play ranked 5s on your list and sometimes, some players dont fit with other players.

add me ingame as i dont check forums much and will be away from monday

thanks blzdragon

replies.body: Sure, I'd be happy to play mid lane.
no thanks dont need players like you
